```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


# Load the snp_counts.txt into current R environment 

```{r}

library(tidyverse)

snp_enrichment_values <- read.table("~/qbb2024-answers/quantbio_lab_fall24/week2_09202024/question_2/snp_counts.txt", header = TRUE, sep = "\t")

```



# Log2 transform enrichment values 

```{r}

snp_enrichment_values <- snp_enrichment_values %>% mutate(log2_enrichment = log2(Enrichment))
snp_enrichment_values$log2_enrichment 

```



# Plot SNP enrichment for each feature as a line plot

```{r}

ggplot(snp_enrichment_values, 
       aes(x = MAF, y = log2_enrichment, color = Feature)) +
  geom_line() +
  ggtitle("Examining SNP log2 transformed enrichment values vs minor allele frequencies") +
  xlab("Minor allele frequency") +
  ylab("Log2 transformed enrichment values") + 
  theme_classic()

```
